mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student (student_num, password, email, student_name, msg_interval, is_activated) VALUE (#{student.account}, #{student.password}, #{student.email}, #{student.courseName}, #{student.messageInterval}, #{student.activation})
mapper.update: UPDATE student SET student_num = #{student.account}, password = #{student.password}, email = #{student.email}, student_name = #{student.courseName}, phone = #{student.phone}, msg_interval = #{student.messageInterval}, is_activated = #{student.activation} WHERE id = #{student.studentId}
